titleInfo.title: Exterior of the Lutz Overall Factory

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#416 Lutz Overall Factory, Leon Obodov, mgr.'' On back of photograph: ''Lutz Overall Factory on Larimer St. Leon Obodov, 8th from left, was manager c. 1905-1910. The Lutz's employed many immigrant Jews during the early years of the century. #416.''

mods.abstract: Exterior of the Lutz Overall Factory on Larimer Street in Denver, Colorado. There is a large group of employees standing in front of the factory. Leon Obodov (8th from left) was manager at the time. The factory employed many immigrant Jews during the early part of the 20th century.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 42.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
